title: Introduction to Personal Finance
description: Learn the basics of managing your personal finances.

lessons.title: Understanding Income
lessons.content: Learn about different types of income and how they can impact your financial health.

lessons.title: Budgeting Basics
lessons.content: Discover how to create a budget and stick to it.

title: Investing 101
description: Get started with investing, from stocks and bonds to mutual funds and retirement accounts.

lessons.title: What is Investing?
lessons.content: Learn what investing is and why it's important.

lessons.title: Understanding Risk and Reward
lessons.content: Discover the relationship between risk and reward in investing.
